divs: Sighting DetailsI WOKE UP AT 04:00 HOURS AND WENT DOWNSTAIRS FOR A DRINK, YOU HAVE TO WALK BOUT 4 FEET INTO THE KITCHEN TO TURN ON THE LIGHT, AS I OPENED THE KITCHEN DOOR AND WENT TO TURN ON THE LIGHT I SAW A RED LIGHT OUT OF THE CORNER OF MY EYE, SO I WENT TO THE KITCHEN WINDOW TO SEE WHAT I SAW OR IF I WAS GOING MAD, THEN I SAW ANOTHER LIGHT, PULSATING, ON AND OFF, SO I WAS LOOKING AT HTEM AND RELISED THEY WAS SLOWLY MOVING TOGETHER, PARALELL BEFORE I KNEW IT THERE WAS ANOTHER, RANDOM PULSATING LIGHT, IT WAS GETTING HARDERTO SEE THEM AS IF THEY WERE GOING UP IN THE SKY BUT STILL MOVING ALSO ACROSS THE SKY, I THEN WAS DRAWN AT LOOKING INTO THE CENTRE OF THESE THREE LIGHTS AND RELISED THAT THE SKY WAS DARKER IN THE MIDDLE OF THESE THREE LIGHTS THAN NORMAL, IT WAS A SOLID STRUCTURE IM 100% SURE OF IT, TEN MINUTES ON IM STOOD IN SHOCK WITH AN EMPTY GLASS IN THE DARK LOOKING UP THINKING WHAT IS THIS THING!!! IT THEN SLOWLY MOVED OVER THE HOUSES AND I LOST SIGHT, it WAS TRUELY OUT OF THIS WORLD, NO MAN MADE OBJECT CAN BE SO LARGE AND MAKE NO NOISE AND ALSO KEEP ALTITUDE AND DIRECTION
trends: There have been no other sightings in Skelmersdale
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: NEVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE IT, BLACK TRIANGLE, DARK. PULSATING LIGHTS, SEEMED TO BLEND IN WITH THE SKY, WHEN I STUDIED IT FURTHER I RELISED IT WAS A SOLID OBJECT,
